notes.combination_plate: Dinner Combo, Served All Day with Fried Rice, Egg Roll. Extra $1.25 for a Fountain Drink Per Combo
notes.lunch_special: Mon. - Fri.: 11:00 am - 3:00 pm. Served with Fried Rice and an Egg Roll.

items.name: PACK 1
items.description: Serves 2 or More. Includes Two Small Drink, One Large Entree By Menu, (8 PC) Crab Rangoon & 2 Egg Roll. Comes with a Small White Rice. (Fried Rice Substitution $0.50 Extra)

items.name: PACK 2
items.description: Serves 4 or More. Includes One 2 Liter Drink, Two Large Entree By Menu, (15 PC) Crab Rangoon & 4 Egg Roll. Comes with Medium White Rice. (Fried Rice Substitution $1.25 Extra)

items.name: PACK 3
items.description: Serves 6 or More. Includes One 2 Liter Drink, Three Large Entree By Menu, (15 PC) Crab Rangoon & 6 Egg Roll. Comes with Large White Rice. (Fried Rice Substitution $1.75 Extra)
